Content.Text:
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you want to exchange something? I've
got lots of great merchandise... huh?
Sandra!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Aha ha ha! Michelle, is that you? What's
up?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nothing in particular, but I was in the
area so I came by to say hello!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
But you've got some customers, so I'll
come back later...

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah hah, don't worry about them.
<PAGE>
Look at you, dearie, you always looks so
cute and charming.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh please, this old getup? You're no
slouch yourself in the beautification
department anyway, are you?<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
Your hair looks like a pink rose. So
lovely!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah hah, you think so? Your own
pink hat is very lovely too.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
R-Really? I love this hat, so thank you!
<PAGE>
I love that frill you always wear around
your neck, too.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You do? I think our tastes match quite
nicely! Hah hah hah.
<PAGE>
That large pink ribbon on your back is
lovely too, very cute. It suits you
perfectly.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, thank you! You like pink as well,
don't you Sandra?
<PAGE>
Anyone who loves pink has to be a nice
person, don't you think?

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah hah! That's right! Just right!
Pink is the best!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Tee hee! Our tastes are perfectly
matched.<RED>∀</RED> That makes me so happy.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My too. It feels good to have so much in
common with a young person like
yourself. Hah hah hah...

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know! Here, you can have this.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's got the same design as the clothing
I'm wearing right now.
<PAGE>
I think it'll suit you even more than it
does me!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's for me? Really? Thank you!
It's so lovely to get a nice gift.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll give you a lovely gift in return,
then.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, thank you! I'll wear it at my next
show, for sure!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was a lot of fun talking with you
today. Do come by again!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I had a lot of fun too. I'll definitely
come again soon.<RED>∀</RED> Come and see my
magic show, too!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, still here? So, what can I do for
you? Heh heh heh!
